txt.en: This mirror is cracked and about to break. It appears that the local Orcs and goblins have been using it for target practice. As you go to touch it, you hear the sounds of approaching Orcs.

'You found a nearly broken mirror out there, you say? And you defended it from attack? Well my word, you are a rather honourable one. I would not have expected such heroism from someone outside of the Garrison.'
The mirror you found is cracked and at risk of being destroyed.
The mirror is safe, for now
Goblins and Orcs are attacking the mirror, attempting to destroy it.
Talk to Kúli at the Orc-watch
Kúli is at the Orc-Watch.\n\nThe dwarf Kúli will be interested in knowing the mirror here is still safe.
